Plot: The true story of Paul Potts, a shy, bullied shop assistant by day and an amateur opera singer by night who became a phenomenon after being chosen for -- and ultimately winning -- Britain's Got Talent (2007).
Title: One Chance
Actors: James Corden, Alexandra Roach, Julie Walters, Colm Meaney
tomatoConsensus: Predictable and sentimental, yet thoroughly agreeable, One Chance is an unapologetic crowd-pleaser that achieves its admittedly modest goals.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 3 wins & 4 nominations.
